title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 259 - Declaratory Rulings for NON-FLFLPA Matters
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 259

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

Statutory authority: Labor Law, art. 20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
